name: Anthropic Prompt Engineering Certification
description: Advanced certification in prompt engineering with Claude AI. Mastered techniques for effective prompt design, chain-of-thought reasoning, and building robust AI applications.

name: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
description: Foundational AWS certification demonstrating cloud computing knowledge, AWS services, security, architecture, pricing, and support.

name: LangGraph Multi-Agent Systems
description: Specialized training in building complex multi-agent workflows using LangGraph. Covered state management, conditional routing, and production deployment patterns.

name: Mobile Application Development
description: Comprehensive mobile development course covering Xamarin and Android Studio. Learned to build cross-platform mobile applications with native features and modern UI patterns.

name: JavaScript Full Stack Development
description: Full-stack JavaScript development course covering modern JavaScript, Node.js backend development, and React frontend framework. Practical projects covering REST APIs, authentication, and state management.

name: Python for AI & Machine Learning
description: Comprehensive course on Python for AI and ML applications. Covered NumPy, Pandas, scikit-learn, and deep learning fundamentals with TensorFlow and PyTorch.
